item.description:

Read the rules, you have to post this in the topic provided above.

"C\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp *.java pause

item.title: Compilier
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

@echo off @TITLE E Bunny's Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

try that

Read full topic

item.title: Compilier
item.dc:creator: @ikilledhomer ikilledhomer
item.description:
@ikilledhomer wrote:

i downloaded a source and it gave me this in the compilier…

@echo off
@TITLE E Bunny’s Compiler
if exist “%programfiles(x86)%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles(x86)%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

what do i change it to so i can compile??? help? Its Ultimate PVP source

Read full topic
